Joe Melia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Melia 0 Joe Melia (23 January 1935, Islington, London – 20 October 2012, Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire) was a British actor. He was educated at the City of Leicester Boys' Grammar School and Downing College, Cambridge, where he read English.He first came to notice in Peter Nichols’s A Day in the Death of Joe Egg (Glasgow Citizens, 1967). Joe_Melia ( 23_January_1935 , Islington , London – 20_October_2012 , Stratford-upon-Avon , Warwickshire ) was a_British_actor .
